content: I donâ€™t spend much time on Instagram anymore. I deleted all of my posts along with my avatar some time ago, but still have an account and enjoy scrolling through things once a week or so. Questlove consistently posts great things and last week he posted what is, I think, one of the best Instagram posts ever from some dude who calls himself show_bits. He has some other posts as well. For instance, Thom Yorke trying to remember where he parked made me laugh pretty hard.
